  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(int[] update)
      Updates the viewable using numbers from the getStatus
      Specified by:
      update in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      update - array composed of 18 integer (from 0 to 4, from 7 to 11 and from 13 to 17 there are only zeros, design error) 5 -> Integer corresponding to the resource of the first mutable input 6 -> Integer corresponding to the resource of the second mutable input 12 -> Integer corresponding to the resource of the desired mutable output (go to intToResource method)

    • intToResource

      private WarehouseObjectType intToResource​(int i)
      Creates the match between the given int and the corresponding resource in the enum WarehouseObjectType
      Parameters:
      i - int corresponding to the resource wanted
      Returns:
      the resource wanted in the form of WarehouseObjectType

    • deleteZeros

      private String deleteZeros​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot)
      Helps to "compress" the string, so we have "" if the resource does not exist and we don't have empty spaces
      Parameters:
      i - index of the production (mutableInput1(0)/mutableInput2(1)/mutableOutput(2))
      wot - type of resource, used to convert resource in colour
      Returns:
      one marker for the type of resource or an empty string if the resource does not exist
